@jpwain @slightlylate @Netlify I can help with that: Each deploy (on any branch / deploy preview) gets a unique URL so the specific build can always be addressed. That's the permalink. Deploy previews & branch builds also get a URL which always shows the latest build in that context. Good to share and track.
